Here we deliver you four ideas about the best way to keep your RX sport sunglasses.

Initially of all, you need to take on and acquire off your prescription sport sunglasses with both two hands. It's pretty perilous when you just just take on or off it with 1 hand. Never use coarse cloth and improper water to wash the lenses, which may achievable scratch and corrode the surface of your lenses.
Third, you will discover some skills when you wash your sport sunglasses. Under no circumstances touch the lenses and just use the dedicated cloth to clean the surface of lenses slightly. Place on http://www.obsunglass.com/ some eyeglasses washings after which clean them for two or 3 periods. Then, dry it for the cool ventilated position.
